**ITQ: Lobby Partial Roof Replacement, Fredericton Research and Development Centre**
=====================================================================================

**Tender Announcement:**
------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified contractors to submit expressions of interest for the **ITQ: Lobby Partial Roof Replacement, Fredericton Research and Development Centre**.

**Project Overview:**
-------------------

This tender is for the supply and installation of new 2-ply modified bitumen roofing membranes on the lobby roof, and replacement of water-damaged gypsum board ceiling in the lobby area of Building 95 at the Fredericton Research and Development Centre. The project is located at 95 Innovation Rd, Fredericton, NB.

**Key Dates:**
-------------

*   Tender closing date: 2023-10-19, 14:00 hours (EDT)
*   Expected contract start date: 2023-11-10
*   Contract duration:  Ongoing until completion

**Requirements:**
----------------

*   Supply and install new 2-ply modified bitumen roofing membranes on lobby roof
*   Replace water-damaged gypsum board ceiling in the lobby area

**Evaluation Criteria:**
-----------------------

*   Lowest Price

**Classification:**
-----------------

*   Building and facility maintenance and repair services
*   Roofing and siding and sheet metal services

**Trade Agreements:**
------------------

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
---------------------------

*   Fredericton, New Brunswick

**Region of Delivery:**
----------------------

*   Fredericton, New Brunswick

**Contact Information:**
-------------------------

*   Edward Johnston, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Email: [edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: Not available
*   Fax: Not available
